root.name: Escape From Bug Island
root.description: Overview Escape From Bug Island is an early-generation Wii title that was released in North America on July 24, 2007 by Eidos. The game is entitled Necro-Nesia in Japan. In the game, the player must stay alive after journeying to an island infested with giant, mutated insects. Escape From Bug Island was released to poor reviews. The lackluster graphics, poor controls and poor story, among other reasons, were commonly cited for the game's failure.
